A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just terrible. This is some childish Disney film that took themes from Star Wars. The plot is awful\, regardless of whether its Star Wars or not. I dont know why theyre obsessed with the theme of anyone can be special\, you dont have to be a skywalker. People watch star wars for the field wielding and lightsaber duels\, not stupid ship cleaners who are given major roles to satisfy the SJW crowd. And the best part about this new trilogy was snoke\, who turned out to be a complete waste of time and totally slapped the audience in the face. What is the point in developing and interesting character and using it to justify the first orders unexplained strength if you kill that character before explaining anything or using him to his full potential. Honestly\, why did Disney hire Rian Johnson\, who previous films are also terrible - his directing is exemplary but script is abominable and\, frankly\, I feel like the potion of my life that I spent playing Star Wars with friends or by myself with figurines as a child is invalidated by this non-star Wars trash that seems to have been defecated by Disneys most unimaginative and primitive team. I cant even see a point in watching the next film because there are no interesting characters left\, and no feasible way there can possibly be a major conflict as both sides have lost nearly everything in terms of assets. Not sure how the 20-person strong resistance is going to muster a new fleet\, but I wont be surprised if Disney maintains this terrible script writing which seems to only appeal to 4-year olds. So disappointed.
